    • Constructor Detail

      • Subscription

        public Subscription(Customer u,
                    int cityId,
                    java.time.LocalDate purchaseDate,
                    double fullPrice,
                    double pricePayed,
                    java.time.LocalDate expirationDate)
             throws java.sql.SQLException
        This is the normal public constructor for subscription object
        Parameters:
        u - the customer object that buy the subscription
        cityId - the city id of the subscription
        purchaseDate - the subscription purchase date
        fullPrice - the full price of the subscription
        pricePayed - how much is actually for the subscription
        expirationDate - when does the subscription is expired
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the access to database failed

    • Method Detail

      • _createSubscription

        public static Subscription _createSubscription(int id,
                                               int cityId,
                                               int userId,
                                               java.time.LocalDate purchaseDate,
                                               double fullPrice,
                                               double pricePayed,
                                               java.time.LocalDate expirationDate)
                                        throws java.sql.SQLException
        This function create subscription object according to all the inputs (supposed to be used only in Database)
        Parameters:
        id - the subscription id
        cityId - the city id that contains the subscription
        userId - the user id that create the subscription
        purchaseDate - the subscription purchase date
        fullPrice - the full price of the subscription
        pricePayed - how much is actually for the subscription
        expirationDate - when does the subscription is expired
        Returns:
        new subscription object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the access to database failed

        id - the subscription id
        cityId - the city id that contains the subscription
        userId - the user id that create the subscription
        purchaseDate - the subscription purchase date

        pricePayed - how much is actually for the subscription
        expirationDate - when does the subscription is expired

        Returns:

      • _Resubscribe

        public static boolean _Resubscribe(Subscription sub,
                                   double fullPrice,
                                   double payedPrice)
                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Resubscribe the subscription with the same contract, different price
        Parameters:
        sub - the subscription that is going to end
        fullPrice - the full price
        payedPrice - the price after discount (if there is any)
        Returns:
        if it is a re subscription
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if the access to database failed
